bike.description: Hi-Ten frame,  20.5" TT, formed DT/TT, tig welded, externally relieved HT w/ stamped "S" logo, Euro BB, integrated seat collar, 6mm dropouts for 14mm axle

Specialized Fuse, 36h, sealed mech., mid flange, 14mm solid axle
